sources.title: Crime of the Century
sources.description: Title: Crime of the Century Summary: Ex-convict Hank Rogers is searching for his brother Jim, a newspaperman, and becomes involved with a group of people trying to conceal the death of the president of a large corporation so ... Directed by: Philip Ford Actors: Stephanie Bachelor, Michael Browne, Martin Kosleck Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 28 February 1946 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Ex-convict Hank Rogers is searching for his brother Jim, a newspaperman, and becomes involved with a group of people trying to conceal the death of the president of a large corporation so they can profit financially. With the aid of the dead man's daughter, Audrey Brandon, Hank exposes the crooks.

metadata.Plot: Ex-convict Hank Rogers is searching for his brother Jim, a newspaperman, and becomes involved with a group of people trying to conceal the death of the president of a large corporation so they can profit financially. With the aid of the dead man's daughter, Audrey Brandon, Hank exposes the crooks.
metadata.Writer: William Hagens, O'Leta Rhinehart, Gertrude Walker
metadata.Actors: Stephanie Bachelor, Michael Browne, Martin Kosleck
